languages.text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% bonus to dodge against ranged attacks for each shot they made during this round. Also, the burst attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

languages.text: 要塞世界的角色每轮中每使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器开火一次，都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}加成效果，对抗远程攻击时获得1%的闪避{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。此外，每次{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击都会额外叠加10层“全力开火”效果。
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: 要塞世界的角色每轮中每开火一次，都会获得1层闪避加成效果，对抗远程攻击时获得1%的闪避加成。此外，每次连发射击都会额外叠加10层“全力开火”效果。

languages.text: Cada asalto, los personajes de mundo fortaleza ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulativa de +1 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g} por cada disparo realizado durante ese asalto. Además, el ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} a distancia concede 10 acumulaciones adicionales de No dejes de disparar.
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Cada asalto, los personajes de mundo fortaleza ganan una bonificación acumulativa de +1 % a su esquiva contra ataques a distancia por cada disparo realizado durante ese asalto. Además, el ataque de ráfaga concede 10 acumulaciones adicionales de No dejes de disparar.

languages.text: Jede Runde erhalten Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere für jeden von ihnen während dieser Runde ausgeführten Schuss einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +1 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}. Außerdem gewährt der {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g}angriff zusätzlich +10 Stapel von "Nie das Schießen einstellen".
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Jede Runde erhalten Bollwerkwelt-Charaktere für jeden von ihnen während dieser Runde ausgeführten Schuss einen stapelbaren Bonus von +1 % auf Ausweichen gegen Fernkampfangriffe. Außerdem gewährt der Salvenangriff zusätzlich +10 Stapel von Nie das Schießen einstellen.

languages.text: À chaque round, les personnages des mondes forteresses reçoivent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +1 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g} pour chaque tir effectué pendant ce round. De plus, l'attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} à distance confère +10 cumuls supplémentaires de Tirs ininterrompus.
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: À chaque round, les personnages des mondes forteresses reçoivent un bonus cumulatif d'esquive de +1 % dans le cadre des attaques à distance pour chaque tir effectué pendant ce round. De plus, l'attaque en rafale confère un bonus supplémentaire de +10 à la capacité Tirs Ininterrompus.

languages.text: Каждый раунд персонаж с мира-крепости получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +1% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционных атак{/g} за каждый выстрел, который он совершил в текущем раунде. Стрельба {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} дает +10 уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил" дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: Каждый раунд персонаж из мира-крепости получает суммирующийся бонус +1% к уклонению от дистанционных атак за каждый выстрел, который он совершил в текущем раунде. Атаки очередью дают +10 уровней эффекта "стрелять изо всех сил" дополнительно.

languages.text: ラウンドごとに要塞惑星のキャラクターは、このラウンドで行った各ショットの{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠距離攻撃{/g}に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に、+1％{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}のスタックを得る。また、遠距離{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃はネバーストップ・シューティングの追加スタックを+10与える。
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.

traits.locale_text: ラウンドごとに要塞惑星のキャラクターは、このラウンドで行った各ショットの遠隔攻撃に対する回避に、+1％ボーナスのスタックを得る。また、バースト攻撃はネバーストップ・シューティングの追加スタックを+10与える。

languages.text: Kale dünya karakterleri her rauntta, o raunt boyunca yaptıkları her atış için {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılara{/g} karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmalarına{/g} +%1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} (üst üste birikebilir) kazanırlar. Ayrıca menzilli {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırılar{/g}, ilave +10 tetiği asla bırakma birikimi kazandırır.
languages.original_text: Each round fortress world characters gain a stacking +1% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} for each shot they made during this round. Also, the ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack grants an additional +10 stacks of never stop shooting.
